attributes.action: Agree to the publication of the full, unredacted 2020 Russia Report
attributes.additional_details:
When the ISC published a redacted, summary report it classified parts of the report due to alleged sensitive intelligence material. It published a shorter Report to ensure the document was readable. You can read the report here: https://isc.independent.gov.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/CCS207_CCS0221966010-001_Russia-Report-v02-Web_Accessible.pdf

Given the Russian invasion of Ukraine, it is now imperative the full report is released.
attributes.background: Given the Ukraine Crisis and reported links between the government and Russian influence & money, I would like the government to publish the report in full, unredacted. This would have to be in agreement with the Intelligence and Security Committee (ISC) who published the report on 21 July 2020.
